K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:246a-1: shr'i sarba buddha sa ma yo ga d'a ki n'i dza la sam wa ra n'a ma autta ra tantra /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:252b-2: mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:252b-4: ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:252b-5: rtog pa'i cho ga thams cad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:252b-6: grub pa dam pa mchog gi mchog /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:252b-8: cho ga sna tshogs 'dod pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:252b-9: sems can rnams ni 'dul ba dang //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:252b-12: sems can kun don rnam sprul na //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:252b-15: ji bzhin byin gyis brlabs nas kyang //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:252b-19: rang gi lha yi cha lugs su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:252b-20: sgrub pa'i phyag rgyar rab tu bya //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:252b-23: slob ma'i tshogs kun de dang der //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:252b-24: mchod pa byas nas des sgrub bo //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:252b-26: sangs rgyas thams cad rnam sprul pa //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:253a-1: rtag tu da ltar 'byung ba bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:253a-2: ngo bo nyid ni 'da' bar dka'//

K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:253a-8: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:253a-9: mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:253a-10: sgyu ma'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:253a-11: rnam pa sna tshogs kun gyi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:253a-12: sems can kun gyi don mchog rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:253a-14: dpal rdo rje sems dpas dbugs phyung ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:253a-15: 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:253a-16: bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:253a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la; ;'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:253a-18: de tshe sems can thams cad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:253a-19: shin tu stong pa nyid la brtson //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:253a-20: 'gog pa'i chos nyid la sbyor bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:253a-21: 'gags shing yongs su mya ngan 'das; ;rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:253a-23: grol ba thams cad rnam sbyang phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:253a-24: sangs rgyas sprul pa kun tu bskyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:253a-25: stong pa ma yin mi stong min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:253a-26: dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:253a-27: shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:253a-28: thabs kyi snying rje bdag nyid rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:253a-29: de bas de ni snying rje'i thabs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:253b-0: shes rab pha rol phyin @253b par gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:253b-1: rtog pa med pa'i chos rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:253b-2: sems can don du yongs brtags pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:253b-3: rnam par mi rtog la mos pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:253b-4: thams cad rtog pas brtag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:253b-5: brag tsa yi ni sgra 'dra ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:253b-6: tshe kyi tshig tu de 'gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:253b-7: de las theg pa chen po yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:253b-8: yang dag yon tan rgyas pa'i glus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:253b-9: dus gsum pa yi dam tshig gsum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:253b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bstod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:253b-11: mnyam med mi g-yo mnyam med mchog gi chos nyid can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:253b-12: thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel bar mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:253b-13: yon tan mtha' yas dngos grub thams cad sbyin mdzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:253b-14: dri med mi g-yo mnyam med dam pa'i mchog chos can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:253b-15: yon tan shin tu phra ba'i cha la'ang tshad med de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:253b-16: dpe ni nam mkha' dang yang bskrun du yod pa'ang min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:253b-17: dngos grub mtha' yas mnyam med dpe dang bral ba rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:253b-18: sems can khams la dngos grub mchog rnams nges par stsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:253b-19: rtag tu dri ma med pa'i thugs rje shugs las byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:253b-20: smon lam grub pa 'gag pa med pa'i chos nyid can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:253b-21: 'gro ba'i don grub rab tu brtson pa mtha' yas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:253b-22: thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid rtag tu rnam par snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:253b-23: tshad med tshad dang bral bas shin tu rdzogs pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:253b-24: bde bar gshegs pa'i go 'phang dam pa brnyes gyur kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:253b-25: khams gsum kun la rtag tu dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:253b-26: thugs rje spyod pa mi g-yo 'gag par yod mi 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:253b-27: ae ma'o shin tu bzang po'i chos nyid mchog dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254a-1: rnams kyi nang na go 'phang dam pa brnyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254a-2: khams gsum kun la rtag tu dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254a-3: mgon po dus gsum sgrib pa med par rab mkhyen pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254a-4: dam tshig mchog gsum dngos grub dam pa bdag la stsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254a-5: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254a-6: yang dag yon tan rgya chen te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254a-7: lan gcig tsam ni brjod pas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254a-8: sangs rgyas thams cad grub par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254a-9: sangs rgyas kun bdag nyid sbyor bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254a-10: bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di nyid kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254a-11: dus gsum pa yi rgyal ba kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254a-13: sku ni blta bas mi ngoms pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254a-14: thams cad bdag nyid bstan nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254a-15: legs so zhes nas dngos grub ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254a-16: mchog rnams kun ni rab smin mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254a-17: thams cad bdag nyid 'grub dga' dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254a-18: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254a-19: sangs rgyas 'grub pa mchog kun dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254a-20: rnal 'byor dam pa'ang sbyin par mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254a-21: de nas de yis sgrub pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254a-22: shin tu brtag pa'i dngos grub dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254a-23: gang gis srid pa 'di nyid la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254a-24: dngos grub shin tu rtag thob pa shad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254a-25: rdo rje se gol gtogs pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254a-26: sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254a-27: thal mo legs par sbyar ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254a-28: thal mo lan gsum rnam par brdab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254a-29: dbang po gang dag gang lam gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254a-30: de dang de yi ngo bor bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254a-31: shin tu mnyam gzhag sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254a-32: sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254b-0: ji ltar mos pa'i @254b chags pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254b-1: sha da ba la sogs pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254b-2: ci nas yongs su ma skyo bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254b-3: rtag tu tshad med bzlas par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254b-4: kun tu kun na ma thams cad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254b-5: bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254b-6: sangs rgyas kun tu dngos grub pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254b-7: rab tu mthong zhing mchog grub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254b-8: 'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254b-9: de bzhin dpa' bo thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254b-10: rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254b-12: sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan bsngags pa rgya che ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254b-13: bstod pa'i rgyal po mchog ni lan gcig glur blangs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254b-14: kun tu 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor dam pa rtag pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254b-15: dngos grub mi zad bde ba'i mchog nyid thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254b-16: bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254b-17: thams cad bdag nyid dbang phyug mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254b-18: sna tshogs kun gyis rnam 'dul ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa kun grub ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254b-20: de bas dam tshig gsum la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254b-21: rtog pa bla med thams cad kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254b-22: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254b-23: sems can khams ni rnam par dkrol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254b-24: dpal rnam par snang mdzad kyis dbugs phyung ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254b-25: 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254b-26: bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254b-27: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254b-28: 'gro ba'i tshul du sngon byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254b-29: de tshes sems can thams cad ni; ;shin tu khro gtum gdug par gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254b-30: shin tu gdug par khro ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:254b-32: de nas 'phos nas sems can de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255a-2: shin tu gdug pa chen por gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255a-3: blo ni bdud kyis byin brlabs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255a-4: rims dang dug dang dbyig dug nad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255a-5: phra men ma dang gnod byed gdon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255a-6: bdud dang rnam par log 'dren nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255a-7: shin tu gdug pa chen por gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255a-8: gnas gsum po ni 'jigs byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255a-9: sgrub pa po rnams la yang za //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255a-10: lha la sogs pa'ang 'pho bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255a-11: bstan pa dag kyang 'jig par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255a-12: de nas dbang por bcas pa'i lha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255a-13: tshangs pa'i drung du nye bar dong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255a-14: tshangs pa'ang lha dang dbang por bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255a-15: 'jug sel la yang skyabs su dong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255a-16: tshangs dang 'jug sel lha rnams kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255a-17: lha chen drung du nye bar dong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255a-18: tshangs pa 'jug sel dbang chen dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255a-19: rdo rje can la skyabs su dong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255a-20: de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255a-21: rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis; ;rdo rje se gol phyag rgyas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255a-22: sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255a-23: rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255a-24: dpung pa gnyis ni rdo rjer bcings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255a-25: rdo rje se gol brdabs pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255a-26: sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu mdzad na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255a-27: de yi bka' tsam gyis skrag nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255a-29: sangs rgyas thams cad gshegs 'gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255a-30: gzhan lta smos kyang ci zhig dgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255a-31: rdo rje se gol gtog pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255a-32: 'jig rten khams ni ma lus pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255a-33: sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255a-34: kun gyis til 'bru bzhin du rgyas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255b-0: shin tu @255b gdug par gtum po la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255b-1: zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255b-2: shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255b-3: khro bor de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255b-4: khro bo'i tshul can khros pas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255b-5: 'jig rten gsum dag sreg byed na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255b-6: sangs rgyas thams cad khros pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255b-7: khams gsum ma lus smos ci dgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255b-8: de nas sna yi rtse mo la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255b-9: yid ni brtan par yang dag gzung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255b-10: sna yi dbugs ring dro ba las; ;rgyal bas phyag rgya'i sbyor ba byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255b-11: bcom ldan de nyid rnal 'byor pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255b-12: rdo rje khro bor gyur nas byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255b-13: dpal chen rdo rje he ru ka //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255b-15: sems dpa' sngon por 'bar ba'i ngang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255b-17: 'jig pa chen po'i dus ltar drag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255b-18: dur khrod kyi ni me dang 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255b-20: thod pa mang po'i dbu rgyan can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255b-21: 'jig pa chen po dus ltar drag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255b-22: dur khrod bzhin du rab tu 'jig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255b-23: khro la sogs pa'i tshul ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255b-24: zhal rnams sna tshogs 'gyur ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255b-25: smin ma khro gnyer bcas par 'gyur; ;'bar ba'i lta bas gar byas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255b-26: gu lang dbang chen nye dbang bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255b-27: nyi zla gshin rje tshangs par bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255b-28: gnas gsum dag ni 'bar byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255b-29: thal ba bzhin du rab tu ba shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255b-30: rdo rje rdo rje kha t'am ga /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255b-31: dril bu'i sgra ni gsil ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255b-32: thams cad phab nas slar yang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255b-33: thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:255b-34: de yi 'bar ba nyi ma las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256a-2: bskyed nas ma lus bdud la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256a-3: gdug pa rnams kyi khrag za nus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256a-4: rgyal po de ni de dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256a-5: lhan cig dur khrod rnam par rol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256a-6: thams cad rdo rje mnyam sbyor ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256a-8: shin tu gdug cing khro drag pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256a-9: sems can khams ni rnam sbyangs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256a-10: dag pa'i sangs rgyas zhing rnams su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256a-11: sangs rgyas byang chub dag la bkod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256a-12: rdo rje 'dod khro la sogs kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256a-13: rtog pa bla med thams cad kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256a-14: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256a-15: sems can khams ni rnam par sbyangs; ;dpal he ru ka sa dbugs phyung ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256a-16: 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256a-17: bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256a-19: 'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung pa; ;de tshe sems can thams cad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256a-20: log par lta la gnas par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256a-21: shin tu lta ba ngan pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256a-24: byang chub sems ni rnam sbyang phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256a-25: padmo chags par sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256a-26: rdo rje chos su gnas par gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256a-28: tshon gyi nyes pas mi gos pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256a-29: de bzhin bag chags khams gsum gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256a-30: nyes pa sna tshogs rnam par dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256a-31: 'dis ni kun tu gzigs pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256a-32: rgyal ba dbang phyug nyid du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256a-33: dpal ldan spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256b-0: rdo rje @256b sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256b-1: 'dod chags thams cad dag pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256b-2: mchog sbyin dam pa bcom ldan 'das //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256b-3: 'dul ba'i thabs ni sna tshogs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256b-4: sna tshogs pa ni 'dul bar spro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256b-5: kun tu spyan ras gzigs dbang rgyal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256b-6: padmo gar gyi dbang phyug gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256b-7: padmo'i rgyal po mnyam sbyor ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256b-8: mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog des //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256b-9: padmo gar dbang la sogs kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256b-10: rtog pa bla med thams cad kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256b-11: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256b-12: sems can khams ni rnam par sbyangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256b-13: dpal padmo gar gyi dbang phyug gis dbugs phyung ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256b-14: 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba; ;bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256b-16: 'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256b-17: de tshe sems can thams cad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256b-18: shin tu gdug cing brkam par gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256b-19: shin tu 'jungs par gyur pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256b-20: yi dvags rnams dang dmyal bar ltung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256b-21: de nas 'phos nas slar yang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256b-22: shin tu dbul por skyes par gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256b-23: bkres dang skom pa'i skyon rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256b-24: de dag phan tshun gsod par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256b-25: shin tu gdug pa sbyang ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256b-27: dam pa'i don gyi nor chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256b-28: rdo rje nyi ma byung bar gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256b-29: nam mkha'i snying pos thams cad phyogs //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256b-32: mkha' las rin chen thams cad 'bebs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:256b-33: shin tu gdug cing khro ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:257a-2: shes rab thabs kyi nyi ma ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:257a-3: rab tu gdung ba kun bsgrubs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:257a-4: bya ba dang ni bzlog pa dang //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:257a-8: 'jig rten gsum rgyal la sogs kyi //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:257a-17: shin tu brtson 'grus chung ba yis //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:257a-23: thams cad dag par mos pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:257a-24: sdig med stobs kyis ngo thon du //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:257a-26: shin tu gdug cing khro gtum pa'i //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:257a-32: ngo thon stobs kyis de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:257a-33: dgra cha lnga yis brgal nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:257b-0: @257b de tshe 'khrig 'jig rten gsum las rgyal //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:257b-4: rang gi rgyal srid rtag tu skyong //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:257b-6: khro ba rnams la khro ba'i mchog /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:257b-12: de tshe longs spyod rang gir spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:257b-13: sdig med stobs kyis ngo thon du //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:257b-17: skye rgu'i bdag po rab mnan nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:257b-18: lha mo rab tu zhi ba 'phrog /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:257b-20: sdig med stobs kyis ngo thon du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:257b-21: 'dod pa'i lha ni rab mnan nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:257b-22: dga' sdug mi yi dbang phyug ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:257b-23: 'phrog nas de tshe nye bar spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:257b-24: de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:257b-26: rdo rje las mchog rnam gnon pa //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:258a-3: sdig med stobs kyis ngo thon du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:258a-4: rtsal gyis pha rol gnon pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:258a-5: sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu 'grel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:258a-6: lha yi dngos grub dka' ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:258a-7: sangs rgyas byang chub bde chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:258a-8: go 'phang mchog gi rtag pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:258a-9: rang gi rnal 'byor gyis thob nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:258a-10: sems can khams ni du ma dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:258a-11: ma lus par ni rgyas 'debs shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:258a-12: 'chi med byang chub dka' ba dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:258a-13: sems can rnams la brtan par sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:258a-14: rta mchog rnam par sprul pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:258a-15: ma lus lus pa med pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:258a-16: bskal pa kun tu srid par gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:258a-17: sems can kun gyi don kyang byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:258a-18: de ltar rta mchog dpal la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:258a-19: rtog pa bla med thams cad kyis //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:258a-26: rang byung rnams kyi gtam gyi rtags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:258a-27: nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:258a-28: rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:258a-29: grub pa'i dbang phyug rab grub pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:258a-30: thams cad bdag nyid 'jug par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:258a-31: ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:258a-32: sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las gtam gyi phyag rgya zhes pa'i rtog pa ste lnga pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:258b-0: de @258b nas gzhan yang thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:258b-1: rnam pa sna tshogs mchog 'byung ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:258b-2: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:258b-3: mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i bde mchog bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:258b-5: dngos; ;rdo rje sems dpa' bde 'byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:258b-6: gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:258b-7: thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:258b-8: sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig dpal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:258b-9: rdo rje sems dpa' snang ba bde; ;de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha rdzas mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:258b-10: rin chen rgyan la sogs pas spras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:258b-11: dril bu rgyal mtshan mchog ldan pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:258b-12: bla re dam pa bres pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:258b-13: rdo rje glu dang mchod la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:258b-14: glu dang sil snyan rnam par 'phrul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:258b-15: me tog bdug pa'i sbyor ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:258b-16: mar me dri dang sogs ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:258b-17: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:258b-18: mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog bsgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:258b-19: yang na bdag gi gnas dag gam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:258b-20: skyed mos tshal la sogs pa bsgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:258b-21: der ni dang por gdan bshams te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:258b-23: sna tshogs padmar ras kyis g-yogs //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:258b-30: ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du dgod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:258b-31: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:258b-32: rta babs bzhi yis mdzes par byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:258b-33: rdo rje rin chen padma sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259a-0: sgo srung dang ni ldan par @259a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259a-1: byas; ;rang gi lha dang 'dra ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259a-2: bud med dag ni legs bsgrubs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259a-3: skel bzang rang gi phyag rgyas mtshan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259a-4: tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor brtag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259a-5: mi yi tshal ni grub pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259a-6: dmar chen po zhes pa bar bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259a-7: ngo bo nyid kyi mthu dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259a-8: rang bzhin gyis ni de grub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259a-9: rdo rje'i chu dang rdo rjer bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259a-10: mtshal chen po dag sgrub pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259a-11: mthu yis rab tu grub pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259a-12: padmo'i snod kyi nang du bzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259a-13: chags pa chen po bcom ldan 'das //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259a-14: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhing shegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259a-15: sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i thugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259a-17: de yi mtshal dang khu ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259a-18: mtshan chen po ni sgrub pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259a-19: chags pa chen po las byung bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259a-20: dmar chen po zhes bya bar bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259a-21: dmar chen dang ni ga bur bcas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259a-22: tsandan dmar por sbyar ba dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259a-23: tshogs kyi dbus su bzhag pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259a-24: ra sa ya na kun slong ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259a-25: rang gi lha yi sbyor ldan pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259a-26: srin lag dang ni mthe bo'i rtses //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259a-27: zhi ba'i btung ba bzhin myangs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259a-28: rtag pa yin dngos grub thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259a-29: sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259a-30: ra sa ya na bde ba 'dis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259a-31: rdo rje sems dpa'i tshe dang gzhan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259a-32: nad med pa dang bde mchog 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259a-33: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259a-35: 'dus pa der mi zhugs pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259a-37: kun tu kun nas thams cad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259b-0: @259b bdag; nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259b-2: kun gyi dngos por de 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259b-3: 'dis ni srung ba byas pas dpal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259b-4: rdo rje sems dpa' bzhin du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259b-6: sangs rgyas thams cad bdag nyid 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259b-7: de nas khrus byas dri zhim lus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259b-8: ci 'byor ba yi gos dang rgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259b-9: sna tshogs gos bzang bgos dang ni; ;me tog phreng ldan kha dri zhim //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259b-10: sna tshogs kun gyi skal bzang pos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259b-11: slong pas dpal gyis dal gyis su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259b-12: gos gdab pa yi sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259b-13: bdag gi 'byung ba bskul bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259b-14: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259b-15: shar ba dag ni mthong ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259b-16: sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259b-18: nges pa'i lam dang kun ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259b-19: rnam par 'das pas rnam par brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259b-20: brtan zhing grub pa slong byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259b-21: kun nas slong ba'i bde ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259b-22: stong pa shin tu rnal 'byor yod med mthus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259b-23: nam mkha' nyid du dam tshig nye bar gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259b-24: bde gshegs bde bar gshegs pas bzhengs su gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259b-25: rdo rje sems dpa' skal bzang dpal khyod bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259b-26: 'di dag nyid kyi glur blangs na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259b-27: shin tu mya ngan yongs 'das pa'i /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259b-28: shi ba'ang slar ni slong 'gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259b-29: yang srid pa lta ci zhig smos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259b-30: lam bzhi dang ni mnyam ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:259b-31: rnam par 'das pas mdzes par byas //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:260a-6: 'jig rten gsum po bdag la bsgrub //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:260a-9: sna tshogs kun gyi skal bzang po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:260a-11: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:260a-12: lha mo kun dang bde myos pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:260a-13: rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:260a-14: nyi ma zla ba gsal bar 'char //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:260a-15: rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag sbyor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:260a-17: lan gcig dmigs pa tsam gyis kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:260a-18: bde ba'i dngos grub kun 'byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:260a-19: brtan cing grub pa slong byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:260a-20: sna tshogs 'brang bas de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:260a-21: gandharbha pa dang sha da ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:260a-22: glu dbyangs sna tshogs glus bsgrub po //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:274a-8: chags med la sogs chags tshon phyir; ;dkar zhing sma tshogs gsal ba'i mdangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:274a-9: chos kyi rgyal srid rab bsgrubs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:274a-10: rin chen chos las lhag pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:274a-11: de bas theg chen byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:274a-12: rgyal ba rdo rje rin chen can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:274a-13: g-yas pa'i mthe bong gung mo gnyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:274a-14: g-yon pa'i khu tshur bcangs pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:274a-15: sor mo kun la reg pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:274a-16: rtsa ba'i phyag rgya yin par grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:274a-17: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi; ;shes rab pha rol phyin gsal yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:274a-18: byang chub sems chen skye ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:274a-19: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:274a-20: phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:274a-21: shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i tshul /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:274a-22: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:274a-23: rab tu bsgrags par 'gyur ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:274a-24: byang chub sems chen bskyed pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:274a-25: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:274a-26: sangs rgyas nyid du rig par bya; ;mchog tu rtag pa'i sangs rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:274a-27: gang gis ldan pa 'di mthong zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:274a-28: rnam pa kun tu mchod byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:274a-29: de yi sangs rgyas rtag pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:274b-0: mthong zhing mchod pa byed @274b par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:274b-1: sems ni bskyed ma thag tu yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:274b-2: chos kyi 'khor lo legs pa bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:274b-3: dpal dam tshig ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:274b-4: g-yas pa'i yan lag gnon pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:274b-5: g-yon pa'i yan lag kun las rgyal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:274b-6: sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:274b-7: bdud rnams thams cad rab tu 'joms //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:274b-8: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i skyil mo krung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:274b-9: rdo rje khu tshur bcangs nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:274b-10: lag pa g-yon pas bkab pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:274b-11: sangs rgyas kun blo dngos grub rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:274b-12: ma lus lus pa med pa'i 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:274b-13: de bzhin dpal ldan he ru ka'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:274b-14: rdo rje khu tshur chen po dag pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:274b-15: dpa' bo 'dod pa'i dngos grub rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:274b-16: ma lus lus pa med par 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:274b-17: padmo'i bud med khu tshur ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:274b-18: de bzhin g-yon pas bkab na yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:274b-19: byang chub spyod rab 'grub pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:274b-20: ma lus lus pa med par 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:274b-21: rin chen 'dzin pa'i khu tshur yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:274b-22: lag pa g-yon pas bkab na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:274b-23: sangs rgyas nor kun dngos grub pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:274b-24: ma lus lus pa med par 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:274b-25: sangs rgyas khu tshur bcangs nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:274b-26: lag pa g-yon pas bkab na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:274b-27: sangs rgyas kun gyi tshe 'grub pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:274b-28: ma lus lus pa med par 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:274b-29: bud med phyag rgya bcings nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:274b-30: lag pa g-yon pas bkab na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:274b-31: dngos grub thams cad myur 'grub pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:274b-32: ma lus lus pa med par 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:274b-33: rta gdong dpal gyi khu tshur yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:274b-34: lag pa g-yon pas bkab na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:274b-35: thams cad 'gugs par rab grub pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275a-0: ma lus lus pa med par @275a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275a-1: 'grub; ;dpal grub spyan gyi khu tshur yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275a-2: lag pa g-yon pas bkab ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275a-3: snang ba thams cad rab 'grub pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275a-4: ma lus lus pa med par 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275a-5: dang po sangs rgyas kun snod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275a-6: gnyis pa de bzhin dpa' bo yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275a-7: gsum pa kun tu bzang po'i lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275a-8: bzhi pa mi zad snod yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275a-9: sangs rgyas yan lag kun ldan dpal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275a-10: de bzhin zhal bzang gzungs ma yin; ;sprin chen mo ni bdun pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275a-11: brgyad pa nam mkha'i spyan yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275a-12: gzungs ma thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275a-13: phyag rgya shes pa 'di dag gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275a-14: sangs rgyas sprul pa'i glu mchog ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275a-16: las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275a-17: slong bar byed pa bstan sgrub pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275a-18: de bzhin sna tshogs rgyas pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275a-19: drug pa'i dbyangs kyi glu blangs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275a-20: de pa ta yi glu blang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275a-21: 'jig rten khams mang rdul phran grangs snyed khyab par 'phros pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275a-22: rgyal ba'i don rnams rab tu phra ba'i rdul gyi grangs snyed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275a-23: sprul pa'i sku rnams phra ba'i rdul gyi grangs snyed ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275a-24: srid pa bde chen de bzhin gshegs kun rnam 'phrul sna tshogs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275a-25: rdul phran grangs snyed de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par sprul pa mdzod ho //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275a-26: dpal rnam par snang mdzad sbyor ba aa la la la ho //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275a-28: glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275a-29: nam mkha' thams cad mnyam sbyor ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275a-30: mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275b-0: grub par 'gyur ba gdon @275b mi za; ;de nas bud med bzhi rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275b-1: rang gi yang dag gsang ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275b-2: cho ga rgyas pa'i tshul bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275b-3: me tog la sogs mchod pa bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya zhes pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275b-6: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275b-7: dam tshig la sdang rnam sbyang phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275b-8: dur khrod dpal gyis phyag rgyar gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275b-9: shin tu gdug cing gtum po la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275b-10: zhi pas phan par mi 'gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275b-11: shes rab thabs kyi rnal 'byor gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275b-13: sangs rgyas khros byung khro bo ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275b-14: thal bar 'jig pa mchog yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275b-15: sems dpa' sngon po 'bar ba can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275b-17: gzhan gyis ma yin mi 'phrog pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275b-18: lha rdzas chu yis dgang ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275b-19: 'di ni rang bzhin nyid dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275b-20: mthu dang ngo bo nyid kyis 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275b-21: gos chen po dang blugs pa che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275b-22: sha chen po dang sbrang rtsi che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275b-23: dur khrod kun gyi 'byung po yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275b-24: phyag rgya dpal ldan dbang phyug mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275b-25: shin tu khro gdug gtum pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275b-26: sems can khams rnams rnam sbyang phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275b-27: 'di ni dpal ldan he ru ka'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275b-28: rdo rje rgyal chen dbang phyug mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275b-29: thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275b-30: sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor bu dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275b-31: rgyal srid thams cad rab sgrub pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275b-32: ma lus lus pa med pa 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275b-33: rdo rje kha tv'am rdo rje bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275b-34: dril bu dkrol ba'i sgrar bcas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:275b-35: dpal ldan he ru ka babs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276a-3: rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276a-4: rgyas btab rmongs byas de zos nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276a-5: thal bar gyur ba'ang 'tsho bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276a-6: dpal rdo rje he ru ka rdo rje 'bab pa rnam par 'phrul pa padma gar gyi dbang phyug bcas bya ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276a-7: se ral kha yi tshul dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276a-8: kha tv'am ga la rgya brten byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276a-9: lag pa g-yon na thod pa thogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276a-10: g-yas pa ba dang gsum par byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276a-11: nam mkha'i phyag rgyas rnal 'byor pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276a-13: bud med la sogs rin chen mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276a-14: dngos po thams cad mkha' las 'byin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276a-15: phyag rgya 'di yis yongs btab nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276a-16: bde bar lhag pa'i tshul ston pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276a-17: nam mkha' las ni kun lhags te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276a-18: bdag gi spyod par de spyod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276a-19: drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas; ;nyi zla mkha' 'gro mi bzad tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276a-20: mkha' las sgyu ma kun blags nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276a-21: lus pa med par de za'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276a-22: nam mkha' thams cad mnyam sbyor bskal ba bzang po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i bde ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276a-23: g-yas dang g-yon pa'i sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276a-24: bde bar 'bab pa'i gar byed pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276a-25: skyil mo krung ni phyed bcas la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276a-26: rkang pa rang gi brla bsdams na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276a-27: drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276a-28: nyi zla gshin rje tshangs bcas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276a-29: rgyas btab rmongs byas bslangs nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276a-30: gar dag byed cing de za'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276a-31: de nyid kyi ni sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276b-0: @276b de nas bde bar brla bsdams pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276b-1: legs par bsdams de phyir btags nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276b-2: rab tu bkram ste btung bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276b-3: sgyu ma de dag nyid kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276b-4: de nas bla phrag bskyod pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276b-5: skal bzang lha dang mi rnams kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276b-6: bud med kun la de spyod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276b-7: bde bar reg pa thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba skal ba bzang po dpal rdo rje drag po gnas pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276b-8: de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276b-9: dpal ldan he ru ka babs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276b-10: phyag rgya sna tshogs gnas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276b-11: zhi dang drag po rmongs pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276b-12: dga' ba'i gar byed 'gyur bar bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276b-13: shi ba ldang ba'i sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276b-14: bde ba'i phyag rgya rab tu gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276b-15: zhi dang drag po rmongs byed dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276b-16: gyen du dbugs 'byin gar byed lus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276b-17: lta ba'i phyag rgya grub pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276b-18: gsang ba'i sbyor ba bde mchog gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276b-19: me tog bdug pa'i sbyor ba mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276b-20: chang dang chu dang lcug ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276b-21: ras dang me gtong grub pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276b-22: khyad par du ni rgyas 'debs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276b-23: rtse gcig mnyam par sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276b-24: sbyor ba'i gnyer ba bde ba sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276b-25: mngon par gtor zhing sa gol rdeb //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276b-26: dal bus gyen du dbugs 'byin pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276b-27: g-yon du lta zhing lag pas drangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276b-29: gar byed rab tu rmongs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276b-30: za dang gsang ba'i lus rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276b-31: tshangs pa chen po'i mgo dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276b-32: de bzhin 'jig rten gsum las rgal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:276b-33: de bzhin gzhan las 'dren pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:277a-2: dur khrod dag gi gar byed dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:277a-3: de bzhin rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:277a-4: rab tu 'jigs par sreg pa'i me //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:277a-5: las kyi phyag rgya rab tu gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:277a-6: dang po rgyas 'debs ma yi rgya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:277a-8: gsum pa shin tu rmongs byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:277a-9: de bzhin bzhi pa 'deg byed ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:277a-10: lnga pa gar byed pa yi rgya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:277a-11: drug pa gsod ma'i yin bar bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:277a-12: bdun pa zab mo ba yi rgya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:277a-13: brgyad pa las kyi phyag rgya yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:277a-14: de nas phyag rgya 'di kun gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:277a-15: phyag rgya'i lan rnams bla na med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:277a-16: phyag rgya'i bdag nyid kun 'joms pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:277a-17: khyad bar du ni bshad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:277a-18: dpal ldan rdo rje padmo slong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:277a-19: gar dag byed cing byas na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:277a-20: rgyas btab rmongs byas zos pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:277a-21: thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:277a-22: de nas phyag rgya shes pa 'di; ;dpal ldan rdo rje sbyor ba'i glu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:277a-23: las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:277a-24: khyad par du ni bshad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:277a-25: gzigs pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i rgyas thob la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:277a-26: rnam pa sna tshogs 'o byed 'khyud pas rmongs mdzad de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-008:277a-27: rnam pa sna tshogs bde ba'i mchod ston kun gsol ba //
